project.name: Urban Eye 3D
project.description: JOSM plugin for 3D visualization of buildings

tags.description: The main tag for identifying a building outline.
Specifies the color of the building's walls.
An alternative tag for the total height of the building, including the roof, in meters.
The number of floors (levels) in the main part of the building. Used to calculate height if not specified explicitly.
Specifies the material of the building's walls. Used for texturing and shading.
The number of floors to offset the building from the ground. Used to calculate min_height if not specified explicitly.
Identifies a part of a building, which is rendered as a separate 3D element.
The total height of the building, including the roof, in meters.
The height of the ground floor of the building from the ground, in meters. Used to model buildings on stilts or slopes.
Specifies the color of the roof.
Specifies the direction or orientation of the roof, typically in degrees. Used for directional roof shapes like 'skillion'.
The height of the roof section of the building, in meters.
The number of floors (levels) within the roof structure. Used to calculate roof:height if not specified explicitly.
Specifies the material of the roof. Used for texturing and shading.
Specifies the orientation of the roof ridge, typically 'along' or 'across' the longer axis of the building.
Defines the shape of the roof, which determines the geometry generation algorithm.
